pkgmetadata.longdescription: # gRPC Gateway SupportThis repo generates the missing Python code to support code generated using [gRPC Gateway](https://github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway) protoc annotations.This package depends on `googleapis-common-protos` to provide `google.api.annotations_pb2` and others thatthe generated code will depend on.## Usage```shellpip install grpc-gateway-protoc-gen-openapiv2```## Building 1. Install go 2. `./gen-openapi-proto.sh` will generate the code from grpc-gateway. 3. `python3 -m pip install --upgrade build && python3 -m build` to build the package. 4. *optional* - setup PyPi credentials and `python3 -m pip install --user --upgrade twine && python3 -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*`
